title: 6.5.2 Create ChatMessage component with markdown rendering
body:
## Parent Issue
#27 - 6.5 Chat Interface + Dashboard UI

## Objective
Create chat message bubble component with markdown and code highlighting.

## Requirements
- User/assistant message styling
- Markdown rendering (react-markdown)
- Code syntax highlighting (Prism.js)
- Timestamp display
- Document chip attachments

## Files to Create
- `frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage.tsx`
- `frontend/src/components/chat/DocumentChip.tsx`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] User messages right-aligned, blue
- [ ] Assistant messages left-aligned, gray
- [ ] Markdown headers, lists, bold render
- [ ] Code blocks have syntax highlighting
- [ ] Document chips show filename

## Estimated Time
2.5 hours
